name: Music Mania
description:
SUBMISSION FOR GMTK 2021 GAME JAM

Dodge enemy blasts with one hand and keep the beat with the other!

Music Mania combines high-stress bullet hell mechanics with focus-intensive rhythm game mechanics to create a gaming experience that is difficult to master.

HOW TO PLAY:

Use the WASD keys to move the character on the left side, and use the K and L keys to push the left and right keys respectively on the right side.

Each key in the rhythm game will fire off a red or blue blast depending on the key pressed. Each blast can kill enemies and block bullets in the bullet hell side, but only enemies and bullets of the corresponding color. Survive until the end of the song to win!
